TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeServerStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeServerStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具名的管道的管道伺服器和一或多個管道用戶端之間的通訊，提供單向或雙工的管道。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 具名的管道可以用於處理序間通訊，在本機或網路。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 可由多個共用單一的管道名稱物件。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何處理程序可做為具名的管道伺服器或用戶端，或兩者。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. > [!NOTE] > 如[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 個管道同時可以透過網路連線。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從父處理序的字串傳送至子系上的處理序在相同電腦中使用具名管道。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 這個範例會建立父處理序中的物件值。This example creates a object in a parent process with a value of . 伺服器再等待連接到它的子處理序中的物件。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此範例中，這兩個處理程序是在相同電腦上和物件具有值。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接著，父處理序會將使用者提供的字串傳送給子處理序。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 字串會顯示到主控台。The string is displayed to the console. 這個範例適用於伺服器處理序，會使用類別。This example is for the server process, which uses the class. 整個程式碼範例中，將程式碼管道用戶端和伺服器，請參閱[How to： 使用具名管道網路處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法將會封鎖直到除非管道的傳輸模式設為已讀取已傳送的所有字元而建立的建構函式中設定的緩衝區大小物件。Calling the method will block until all the sent characters have been read unless the transmission mode of the pipe is set to and the buffer size is set in the constructor that created the object. 在此情況下，所有的訊息將會接收。In this case, not all of the messages will be received. 呼叫會導致封鎖，直到已從管道讀取所有資料的伺服器。Calling causes the server to block until all the data has been read from the pipe.

summary.span: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

span.span: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

returns.span: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

span.span: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`null`如果用戶端具有尚未寫入管道，或連線的用戶端未連接與的。The method returns `null` if the client has not yet written to the pipe or if the connected client did not connect with a of . ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法來建立多個同時用戶端要求，可回應的管道伺服器和用戶端模擬的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to create a pipe server that can respond to multiple simultaneous client requests, and a method for client impersonation. 這個範例會建立物件在父處理序，接著會建立多個執行緒等候連接物件。This example creates a object in a parent process, which then creates multiple threads that wait for objects to connect. 用戶端連線之後，會提供伺服器的檔案名稱，該檔案的內容會讀取並傳送回用戶端。After a client is connected, it supplies a file name to the server and the contents of that file are read and sent back to the client. 因為模擬用戶端開啟檔案時，用戶端可以要求只確定它具有足夠的權限開啟的檔案。Because the impersonates the client when opening the file, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: No pipe connections have been made yet.

span.span: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.

exception.span: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.

span.span: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
The pipe is closed.

exception.span: -or- The user name of the client is longer than 19 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接的用戶端的權限會套用到遠端伺服器。The connecting client's permissions are applied to the remote server. 例如，如果連接的用戶端嘗試要求的伺服器上的檔案內容，用戶端可以要求它有足夠的權限開啟的檔案。For example, if the connecting client tries to request the contents of a file on the server, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法來建立多個同時用戶端要求，可回應的管道伺服器和用戶端模擬的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to create a pipe server that can respond to multiple simultaneous client requests, and a method for client impersonation. 這個範例會建立物件在父處理序，接著會建立多個執行緒等候連接物件。This example creates a object in a parent process, which then creates multiple threads that wait for objects to connect. 用戶端連線之後，會提供伺服器的檔案名稱，該檔案的內容會讀取並傳送回用戶端。After a client is connected, it supplies a file name to the server and the contents of that file are read and sent back to the client. 因為模擬用戶端開啟檔案時，用戶端可以要求只確定它具有足夠的權限開啟的檔案。Because the impersonates the client when opening the file, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會導致來封鎖，直到用戶端連線物件。Calling this method causes the object to block until a client connects. ## Examples 下列範例會示範將從父處理序的字串傳送至子處理程序，使用具名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 這個範例會建立父處理序中的物件。This example creates a object in a parent process. 此物件具有值，這會將會封鎖直到物件建立的連線物件。This object has a value of , which then blocks until a object establishes a connection to the object. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分和類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為它是非同步的這個方法會立即傳回，但連線程序完成時用戶端呼叫或。Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls or . 取消要求使用取消語彙基元才管道選項值是建立物件或是取消之前發生方法呼叫。Cancellation requests using the cancellation token will only work if the object was created with a pipe option value of or if the cancellation occurs before the method is called.
